title: Do you REALLY want a Keyboard on your Phone??? - F(x)Tec Pro 1 Phone
description: The F(x)Tec Pro 1 phone might be the best (or only) option out there for people who want a full QWERTY hardware keyboard on their smartphone. It even has arrow keys!...much better than the Blackberry KEY2!  Check out the F(x)Tec Pro 1 at   Buy Slider Phones on Amazon (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  GET MERCH:   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:
